ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 6D Digital SLR Camera Body with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Canon 2400 DSLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Battery Grip for Canon 6D + <6> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <7> Battery Charger for LP-E6 +
<8> 58mm UV Filter + <9> 77mm UV Filter + <10> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <11> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Screen Protectors + <15> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 6D Digital SLR Camera Body with EF 24-105mm L IS USM & 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Grip + Battery & Charger + Tripod + Filters Kit
